quote: You've got to get up every morning with determination if you're going to go to bed with satisfaction
author: George Lorimer

quote: Go as far as you can see; when you get there, you'll be able to see further
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: The individual who says it is not possible should move out of the way of those doing it
author: Tricia Cunningham

quote: When someone tells me no, it doesn't mean I can't do it, it simply means I can't do it with them
author: Karen E. Quinones Miller

quote: A year from now you may wish you had started today
author: Karen Lamb

quote: Happiness is good health and a bad memory
author: Ingrid Bergman
